alert.note: Alert for Beltrami; Clearwater; Hubbard (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks (Northeastern North Dakota and Northwestern Minnesota)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 09 at 7:45PM CDT until July 09 at 8:15PM CDT by NWS Eastern ND and Grand Forks
info.description: The National Weather Service in Grand Forks has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Northwestern Hubbard County in north central Minnesota... South central Beltrami County in north central Minnesota... Central Clearwater County in northwestern Minnesota... * Until 815 PM CDT. * At 745 PM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Bagley, or 25 miles west of Bemidji, moving southeast at 35 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and half dollar size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Bagley, Wilton, Shevlin, Solway, Alida, Becida and northern Upper Rice Lake. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.25 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
